subject: Baseball
College World Series
lead_paragraph: Mikie Mahtook singled in the deciding run with two out in the top of the 11th as L.S.U. won Game 1 of the best-of-three College World Series finals.
snippet: Mikie Mahtook singled in the deciding run with two out in the top of the 11th as L.S.U. won Game 1 of the best-of-three College World Series finals.
